description.narrative: The program, supported by a policy-based loan, is to improve the long-term fiscal sustainability of the RMI government. In 2010, the Asian Development Bank (ADB) approved (i) a program cluster for the public sector program, and (ii) financing from the Asian Development Fund (ADF) of $9.5 million (special drawing rights of 6,413,000) for subprogram 1 of the public sector program. The public sector program supports the implementation of the government's reform initiatives and initiates the adjustments required to achieve long-term fiscal sustainability. Under subprogram 1, policy actions were designed and the implementation of immediate reform priorities began. Subprogram 2 will complete the implementation of the policy actions.

Development partners meeting held (Baseline: first development partners meeting held in December 2010, joint communique agreed to convene regular meetings to track progress toward implementation of the program).
* = A target of "less than" has been applied to allow the government in the overall policy mix to achieve the outcome statement.
